$comment: Offline verification bundle with sample receipts and JWKS
description: Bundle for offline verification testing. Contains test JWKS and sample metadata.

samples.description: Minimal valid PEAC receipt with only required fields
Full PEAC receipt with all optional claims populated
PEAC receipt with InteractionEvidence extension for AI agent calls
PEAC receipt with payment evidence (402 flow)
Receipt with iat in the future (for testing rejection)
Receipt missing required issuer claim (for testing rejection)

notes: The JWKS contains a placeholder key. Use 'peac samples generate' to create actual signed samples.
Sample timestamps are examples; regenerate for current timestamps.
Do NOT use sandbox samples in production.
